name: places/ChIJccabSAT2wokRmdXN9EUCzUs
formattedAddress: 1799 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1799 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: This place is the worst!!!! Highly DO NOT RECOMMEND! They just want your money money money and money! They don’t care for your actual experience! I took lessons with this company and the day of the exam I was given a different car that I had never driven before. I was not given a mock test either which is on the syllabus but when I brought it up to front desk so I can reschedule my road test front desk had the nerves to say he doesn’t go by syllabus but does express how this is supposed to be a contract, smh. Back to like I said, they just want money money money!

text.text: This place is the worst!!!! Highly DO NOT RECOMMEND! They just want your money money money and money! They don’t care for your actual experience! I was not given a mock test either which is on the syllabus but when I brought it up to front desk so I can reschedule my road test front desk had the nerves to say he doesn’t go by syllabus but does express how this is supposed to be a contract, smh. Back to like I said, they just want money money money!

originalText.text:
One of the teachers who teach in the morning taught me that I should always stay in the middle when I walk on a one-way street, and it turns out that I failed the exam because of that bad teaching they gave me, and he was even teaching me that I must steer with both hands on the guide and not with the hand on the co-pilot's seat.

When you go to take the practical exam, they take you in another car, not the one they taught you in, the car has a damaged regular meter and that confuses the student when he is driving, he cannot maintain a speed…

originalText.text: I sign up for this school long time in 2016  but the one  in the bronx . After years of having my permit and failing my road test more than 4 times ,  I found this school around my neighborhood and I gave it another try . The  front desk person  made a scheduled for me and my instructors were awesome. I passed my test . I was sad that after the pandemic the driving school they had in the Bronx is no longer there . It was a great experience.

originalText.text: Whatever you do, do not take their pre licensing aka 5 hour class. Its gonna take way longer than 5 hours because the screen keeps signing you out! They also make you do a quiz for all 7 courses. I do not recommend!

text.text: Whatever you do, do not take their pre licensing aka 5 hour class. Its gonna take way longer than 5 hours because the screen keeps signing you out! They also make you do a quiz for all 7 courses. I do not recommend!

originalText.text: This place is a scam  (5) classes for $378+ tax everything is nonrefundable and you cannot reschedule any of your days once you pay the money is given to the drivers as soon as your pay so there’s no such thing as canceling All they will do for you is give you an extra 15 minutes on one of your day to reimburse you for missing 1 or 2 days.  So you won’t be able to reschedule if you’re at work meeting you have to cancel work to get to this driving lesson because it will be a waste of money. So therefore, there’s no conveniency to this company.
